sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of travel outcome occurring on a trip
message_1: Suppose that on a particular day, 25% of the flights out of an airport are delayed, 10% of the flights are cancelled, and 65% of the flights are on-time. What is the probability that a traveler will experience either a delayed or cancelled flight on that day?
message_2:
To find the probability of a traveler experiencing either a delayed or cancelled flight, we simply add the probabilities of each event occurring:

Probability of delayed flight = 25%
Probability of cancelled flight = 10%

Probability of delayed or cancelled flight = 25% + 10% = 35%

So, the probability that a traveler will experience either a delayed or cancelled flight on that day is 35%.
